## âœ… Submission Checklist

Before submitting, please verify:

### Content Quality
- [ ] Lesson teaches a clear, single concept
- [ ] Learning objectives are specific and achievable
- [ ] Content addresses each learning objective
- [ ] Examples are relevant and clear
- [ ] At least 2-3 exercises included
- [ ] Self-assessment questions included
- [ ] No outdated or deprecated information

### Metadata
- [ ] All required YAML fields present and valid
- [ ] Title is 3-100 characters
- [ ] Description is 1 sentence, 10-200 characters
- [ ] `difficulty` is one of: Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced
- [ ] `duration` includes number and unit
- [ ] `tags` are 1-5 items, lowercase, hyphenated
- [ ] `learning_objectives` are 3-5 specific outcomes

### Technical
- [ ] File named correctly: `lesson-[id]-[slug].md`
- [ ] File in correct subject directory: `docs/lessons/[subject]/`
- [ ] Markdown syntax is valid (no broken formatting)
- [ ] All links work and use proper Markdown syntax
- [ ] Code examples are syntactically correct
- [ ] No broken image references

### Process
- [ ] Reviewed [Quick Start Guide](../../docs/guides/quick-start.md)
- [ ] Followed [Lesson Template](../../docs/templates/lesson-template.md)
- [ ] Read [Metadata Reference](../../docs/guides/metadata-reference.md)
- [ ] Checked [Tagging Guide](../../docs/guides/tagging-guide.md)
- [ ] Branch name: `add-lesson-*` or similar

---
